## ICertificateStoreOptions interface

Options for configuring paths and filenames used by the `CertificateStore`<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICertificateStoreOptions 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[caCertificateFilename?](./debug-certificate-manager.icertificatestoreoptions.cacertificatefilename.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Filename of the CA certificate file within the store directory. If not provided, it defaults to `rushstack-ca.pem`<></>.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[certificateFilename?](./debug-certificate-manager.icertificatestoreoptions.certificatefilename.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Filename of the TLS certificate file within the store directory. If not provided, it defaults to `rushstack-serve.pem`<></>.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[keyFilename?](./debug-certificate-manager.icertificatestoreoptions.keyfilename.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Filename of the TLS key file within the store directory. If not provided, it defaults to `rushstack-serve.key`<></>.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[storePath?](./debug-certificate-manager.icertificatestoreoptions.storepath.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Path to the directory where the certificate store will be created. If not provided, it defaults to `<homedir>/.rushstack`<></>.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
